name: RadioRoot
description:
Represents the radio button itself.
Renders a `<button>` element and a hidden `<input>` beside.

value.description: The unique identifying value of the radio in a group.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user actions.

readOnly.description: Determines if the radio is readonly.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

required.description: Whether the user must choose a value before submitting a form.
